author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Place the olive and sesame oil, stock and soy sauce into a saucepan and bring to the boil. Reduce the heat to a simmer. Add the salmon pieces to the pan and poach for 3-4 minutes, or until almost cooked through. Add the noodles to the pan and remove from the heat. Cover with a lid and leave for a few minutes, until the noodles have softened. To serve, pour the broth into a bowl and sprinkle over the sesame seeds and chives.
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil,  1 tbsp sesame oil,  200ml/7fl oz hot vegetable stock,  1 tbsp soy sauce,  2 x 50g/1½oz pieces salmon fillet, skinned ,  50g/1¾oz rice noodles,  1 tbsp sesame seeds, to garnish,  1 tbsp chopped fresh chives, to garnish
